multitext.text: To play this game you require the latest version Flash Player. Please click the link below and follow the quick and simple installation instructions.
Note that any Jackpots are shown and paid in your account currency.

You have won the %1 Jackpot! Due to technical problems we are currently unable to add the jackpot to your bankroll automatically. To receive your prize, please contact customer support.
We have not been able to place your bet. Please check your updated balance.
This game is not currently available.
Please log into your account. If you were previously logged in, your session may have expired.
The server is currently undergoing maintenance. Your game should resume automatically in a couple of minutes.
Three King Gummy Bear scatter symbols triggers the Free Spins bonus. The King Gummy Bear appears on reels 1, 2 and 3.

Flying Wild symbols will move around to random positions on the reels between each spin. Additional Flying Wild symbols can be awarded during the Free Spins Bonus. Number of Free Spins and initial number of Flying Wilds is determined in the Award Sequence.
Extra Free Spins can be awarded with the +1 Free Spin symbol.
Three Queen Gummy Bear scatter symbols triggers the Respins bonus. The Queen Gummy Bear appears on reels 2, 3 and 4.
The Locked Wild symbols will stay locked during all respins. Number of Respins and Locked Wilds are determined in the Award Sequence.
Three Prince Gummy Bear scatter symbols triggers the Sugar Cash Bonus. The Prince Gummy Bear appears on reels 3, 4 and 5.
The Sugar Cash Bonus awards cash and win multipliers.
Regular Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except feature trigger symbols and +1 Free Spin symbol.
Flying Wild appears in the Free Spins Bonus. Flying Wild substitutes for all symbols except feature trigger symbols and +1 Free Spin symbol.
Respin Locked Wilds appear in the Respins Bonus. Respins Wild substitutes for all symbols except feature trigger symbols and +1 Free Spin symbol.
WINS ARE MULTIPLIED BY BET PER LINE. Only the highest win per active bet line is paid. Bet line wins pay if in succession from leftmost to right. Malfunction voids all pays.

Game Rules
Sugar Trail
About the game Sugar Trail is a 5 reel, 3 row, 40 bet line video slot. The game features Stacked Wilds, Wild Candy Free Spins bonus, Sugar Lock Respins bonus, and Sugar Cash bonus. Theoretical payout is 96,50%
How to play Video slots are very easy to play. Just follow these 3 steps:
1. Choose your total bet 2. Press the SPIN button 3. Check for any win in the WIN field
For more understanding of Settings, Game Rules, and Game Features read the text below.
Description of game functionality
Bet The Total bet is shown in the TOTAL BET display. Change the bet by clicking on the display and choosing the total bet of your choice. The Total Bet is based on the bet per line multiplied with the number of bet lines active.
Spin The game is started by pressing the SPIN button. You can Quick Stop the game by pressing the SPIN button again.
Win Any total win in a game round will be displayed in the WIN field All wins are multiplied by the bet per line. Bet line wins pay in succession from leftmost to right. Only the highest win per active bet line is paid. The separate bet line wins will be displayed on the bet lines during win presentation. In Free Spins only the total win is displayed for each spin.
Paytable All winning combinations in the game can be viewed in the PAYTABLE.
Fast Play The FAST PLAY functionality is used to get the shortest game round possible. The duration of game rounds may vary depending on bandwidth and server response time.
Autoplay Autoplay allows you to play a number of game rounds automatically Press AUTOPLAY and choose a number of game rounds to initiate Autoplay. The remaining number of spins is displayed to the right of the STOP button. Autoplay is stopped by pressing the STOP button.
Settings In the settings panel at the bottom left of the game you can choose: Use SPACE for spin Use SPACE for spin allows you to use your Space Bar on your keyboard to initiate game rounds.
Show Splash Screen on startup This setting allows you to switch the games Splash Screen on and off.
Special symbols
Wild Symbols The game has three different types of Wild Symbols: The Regular Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Bonus Feature trigger symbols, and +1 Spin symbol. The Flying Wild symbols appear in the Wild Candy Free Spins bonus. Flying Wild substitutes for all symbols except +1 Spin symbol. The Respins Locked Wild symbols appear in the Sugar Lock Respins bonus. Respins Wild substitutes for all symbols.
Scatter Symbols Scatter symbols are not bound to bet lines. The game has three different Scatter symbols: The King Gummy Bear symbols triggers the Wild Candy Free Spins bonus, and appears on reels 1, 2, and 3. The Queen Gummy Bear symbol triggers the Sugar Lock Respins bonus, and appears on reels 2, 3, and 4. The Prince Gummy Bear scatter symbols triggers the Sugar Cash Bonus, and appears on reels 3, 4, and 5.
Game Features Wild Candy Free Spins bonus Three King Gummy Bear scatter symbols triggers the Free Spins bonus. The King Gummy Bear symbols appears on reels 1, 2, and 3. Flying Wild symbols will move around to random positions on the reels between each spin. Additional Flying Wild symbols can be awarded during the Free Spins Bonus. Number of Free Spins, and initial number of Flying Wild symbols are determined in the Award Sequence. Extra Free Spins can be awarded with the +1 Spin symbol.
Sugar Lock Respins bonus Three Queen Gummy Bear scatter symbols triggers the Respins bonus. The Queen Gummy Bear symbol appears on reels 2, 3, and 4. Locked Wild symbols will stay locked to their position during the respins. The number of Respins, and Locked Wilds is determined in the Award sequence.
Sugar Cash Bonus Three Prince Gummy Bear scatter symbols triggers the Sugar Cash Bonus. The Prince Gummy Bear scatter symbols appears on reels 3, 4, and 5. The Sugar Cash Bonus awards cash, and win multipliers. Malfunction in the game voids all pays and plays.
Game round has not been completed
